mapper.select: select downloadmanage_id, download_file_name, download_file_uuid_name, download_file_type, download_file_extension_name, download_file_size,download_file_url_key, download_file_url, download_file_limit_down_num, download_file_limit_down_time, download_file_down_num, status, use_status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from tool_downloadmanage where downloadmanage_id = #{downloadmanageId}

select downloadmanage_id, download_file_name, download_file_uuid_name, download_file_type, download_file_extension_name, download_file_size,download_file_url_key, download_file_url, download_file_limit_down_num, download_file_limit_down_time, download_file_down_num, status, use_status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from tool_downloadmanage where download_file_url_key = #{downloadFileUrlKey}
mapper.insert: insert into tool_downloadmanage ( download_file_name, download_file_uuid_name, download_file_type, download_file_extension_name, download_file_size, download_file_url_key, download_file_url, download_file_limit_down_num, download_file_limit_down_time, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark )values( #{downloadFileName}, #{downloadFileUuidName}, #{downloadFileType}, #{downloadFileExtensionName}, #{downloadFileSize}, #{downloadFileUrlKey}, #{downloadFileUrl}, #{downloadFileLimitDownNum}, #{downloadFileLimitDownTime}, #{status}, #{createBy}, sysdate(), #{updateBy}, sysdate(), #{remark} )
mapper.delete:
delete from tool_downloadmanage where downloadmanage_id in
#{downloadmanageId}
